card.name: Form of Disaster
card.ability: Kallistar begins the duel in human form.
Her Ignition style allows her to change to Elemental Form, and her Flare style allows her to change into Human Form. Many effects of her styles differ based on her form.
If Kallistar is in Elemental Form during the ante phase, she gains +2 Power and +2 Priority during the beat and loses 1 life.
If she is in Human Form during the ante phase, she has Soak 1 during the beat.
